messages.message:
Final draft ready for review:

Headline: 'New Library Opening Delayed Until Spring 2025'

Key points:
- Construction delays due to supply chain issues
- $2M budget increase approved
- Temporary study spaces being arranged

Word count: 450
Photos: 3 (construction site, architect rendering, student protest)
Can we get a quote from the student council president?

First draft complete. I've included:
- Timeline of delays
- Interview with project manager
- Student reactions from social media

Needs:
- Official statement from administration
- Better lead photo
Please draft a story about the library construction delay

Basketball preview package ready:

1. Starting lineup analysis (800 words)
2. Coach interview (video + transcript)
3. Opponent breakdown (stats comparison)
4. Season predictions from 3 analysts

Can we get 2 more photos from last season's championship?
Make sure to highlight the new freshman recruit

Working on season preview. Have interviews scheduled with:
- Head coach (today 3pm)
- Team captain (tomorrow)
- Athletic director (pending)

Need photographer for practice shots
Let's do a comprehensive basketball season preview

Controversial parking op-ed submitted:

Title: 'The Great Parking Scam: How the University Profits From Student Desperation'

Arguments:
- 78% increase in permits since 2020
- No new spaces added
- Alternatives not promoted

Potential backlash from admin?
Get a counterpoint from transportation services
Received 3 submissions about parking issues. Strongest is from senior PoliSci major with data backing claims. Needs fact-checking but compelling.
Let's cover the parking permit price hike

Protest gallery edited:
- 12 selects
- 3 B&W conversions for dramatic effect
- Cropped for print/web

Issues:
- Need captions for 4 images
- One student requested blurring (FERPA?)
Make sure we have wide shots showing crowd size

Shot list for tuition protest:
1. Wide crowd (quad steps)
2. Sign close-ups
3. Speaker moments
4. Police presence
5. Student reactions

Sending 2 photographers
Need coverage of the tuition protest today at noon

Final edits complete on all pieces:

- Fixed 47 AP style errors
- Caught 3 factual inconsistencies
- Standardized all grade references (e.g., 'first-year' not 'freshman')

One piece still needs sources for 2 claims
Double-check the president's title in all pieces

Starting final pass on:
- 3 news stories
- 2 features
- 1 opinion

Flagged:
- Inconsistent date formatting
- Overuse of 'very'
- 2 potential libel issues
Please do final edit pass before deadline

Basketball post performance:

Instagram:
- 2,300 likes (+42% from last)
- 89 comments
- 12 shares

Twitter:
- 650 retweets
- Highlight video: 14K views

Best time to post follow-up: Tomorrow 11am
Create a Twitter thread with player stats

Scheduled:
- 3 Instagram posts
- Twitter thread
- TikTok highlights

Need:
- 2 more player quotes
- Behind-the-scenes footage
Let's promote the basketball season preview

FOIA documents reveal:
- 63% of security incidents not reported
- Response times average 22 minutes
- Only 3 officers on night shift

We have 4 student victims willing to talk. Need legal review before publishing names.
Get comment from campus police chief
Found disturbing pattern - 12 assaults in parking garages this semester, none in official reports. Cross-referencing police logs with student accounts.
Follow up on those security incident reports
